data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borowiec, Marek L., Longino, John T. (2011): Three new species and reassessment of the rare Neotropical ant genus Leptanilloides (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Leptanilloidinae). ZooKeys 133: 19-48, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.133.1479, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.133.1479
